title: Adding a suburl to the vue frontend
body:
Feature description
---------
First of all, thank you for the great tool!

When running multiple micro-services it might be necessary to run on a different subpath than '/'. I implemented a work around here: 
https://github.com/kaapana/kaapana/tree/develop/services/applications/doccano/docker/doccano-frontend

where I needed to adapt serval files. Since this feature might be interesting for others, too, I am working on a forked repo on a general integration: https://github.com/klauskades/doccano/tree/feature/prefix_url . I would be happy to discuss about the current implementation and discuss further adjustments. One issue that I face is the loading of images. But I am not sure if this is already covered without issues in the default version. Also I am not sure which ways of running the system should be supported. Currently, I was working with the docker-compose.prod.yml and by starting the services locally.

Thank you for your feedback!

Best Klaus
